actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To provide for the relief of hospitals treating rural populations under the current calculation of the wage index modifier for the prospective payment under Medicare.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act with respect to prospective payment to hospitals for inpatient hospital services to require updates to a specified factor in the calculation of the wage index modifier for certain hospitals in rural and urban areas.

titles.title: To provide for the relief of hospitals treating rural populations under the current calculation of the wage index modifier for the prospective payment under Medicare.
